title: Dan Patrick - Hour 1 - Kyrie Irving Not Backing Down from Boston’s Fans
itunes:title: Dan Patrick - Hour 1 - Kyrie Irving Not Backing Down from Boston’s Fans
description:
Today on The Dan Patrick Show, Jason Smith and Mike Harmon fill in for the crew and dive right into Kyrie Irving’s return to Boston in the playoffs, specifically the point guard’s hostile gestures. The guys address reports coming out of the NFL about a few big name wide receivers who will not be on the field during off season work outs. Then, Warriors HC Steve Kerr had an interesting response when asked about Jordan Poole’s role in the starting line-up. 

#jss

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
